Introduction
This topic contains an overview of erroneous payments, including
definition of
erroneous payments
, and
a duplicate payment
examples of
duplicate payments
, and
erroneous payments that are not duplicate payments
, and
actions to take for erroneous payments
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
